title: Mega Orb Disappearance
body: Hi, not sure if anyone can help me with this but I had 9 mega orbs and had installed league on a new computer and now they're gone any help will be appreciated thanks.

replies.body: Whelp, that was a lot of counting. It took a little bit to count through all of the orbs you've opened recently, but overall it looks like you were able to open all of the orbs you had on your account. If you're sure that you're still missing some, would it possible for you to shoot me a screenshot showing where you had the orbs unopened?
